channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Luxe' Debenhams watch that 'looks just like a Rolex' reduced to £78
item.description: Shoppers can spend less than £80 on the timepiece that looks like it should cost far more

item.title: New holiday warning to Brits in Spain over drinking alcohol and swimming in sea
item.description: The Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO) has warned British holidaymakers about local laws in Spain including alcohol regulations and s...

item.title: Neighbours heard dogs screaming in 'house of horrors' and chased cruel animal abuser
item.description: Officers raided Steven Brown's property in Ashgill, Lanarkshire, where they retrieved a baseball bat, metal pipes smeared with dog's blood, and a dog ...

item.title: NHS alert over cough infection that can spread to the brain - signs to spot
item.description: It is a bacterial infection that usually starts in the lungs, but can spread to other parts of the body

item.title: Three money hacks that can save you £5,000 a year
item.description: Gemma Bird, who has saved hundreds of thousands of pounds through extreme saving techniques, has shared some more practical money saving tips to help ...

item.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
item.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

item.title: New Zealand Parliament Ghost Tour Shows Off Its Spooky Side
item.description: Mysterious deaths, unexplained noises and late-night apparitions are not the usual fodder of daily tours offered at New Zealand's parliament in Wellin...

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred

item.title: ‘New Nostradamus’ made eerie prediction about an oil tanker explosion days before it happened
item.description: 'I saw a ship or something in trouble.'

item.title: Who is Mark Carney? New Canadian PM’s family, career, and more
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.
